ygData.subject: Re: Staff Question and ANSWER!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: so the other skull is what...Doreb s Skull? ... From: Ziffnab MageStorm  To:  Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 9:50 AM
ygData.messageBody:
so the other skull is what...Doreb's Skull?


----- Original Message -----
From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 9:50 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Staff Question and ANSWER!!!


> From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>
> Ok everyone...
>
> The Skull of Jhen Tra is NOT something you affix to your RTS. This is
> a hand held item (yes it works now) which adds 20 mana and 2 Magic
> resistance. Thats it. You must revert to using piercing or 1h blunt
> or no weapon at all. There is another skull out there which can be
> affixed to a staff but the quest is broken.
>
> (or not implemented)
>
> - Ziffnab of Xegony
>
> ** Hi Xaia!!
>
> --- "Scott J. Geertgens" <geertges@...> wrote:
> > From: "Scott J. Geertgens" <geertges@...>
> >
> > >
> > > Any of you Wizards out there know what skull, you
> > need to combine with a
> > > Ruined Totem Staff...and what NPC combines them
> > for you?
> > >
